Name: Hillary
description:
Hillary is from Kyaburere parish, Bugangari subcounty. He is a repeat client with Ugafode. He deals in banana and coffee farming. Unfortunately, Hillary is challenged with not having enough working capital to buy Agro-inputs, such as mulches and manure. These inputs would improve his plantation productivity and therefore increase his production and sales, allowing him to generate more income.

Hillary is requesting a loan to buy those Agro-inputs to enhance his plantations. He is thankful to Ugafode and Kiva for the support,
